game.title: Find the Lost Treasure
game.objective: Retrieve the lost treasure hidden in a secret cave
game.description: Many years ago, a famous pirate named Captain Jack buried his treasure in a secret cave on a remote island. The map to this treasure has been lost, and now it's up to you to find it. Explore the island, solve puzzles, and uncover clues to lead you to the hidden cave where the treasure awaits.

tasks.description: Speak to the tavern owner and ask about the lost treasure
Decipher the riddle on the back of the ancient map
Squeeze through narrow passages and avoid traps to reach the treasure chamber
Fight the guardian of the treasure and retrieve it
